justification: The revised RWA scale consists of 20 items assessed on a 9-point Likert scale which effectively measures levels of RWA. Higher scores indicate a greater endorsement of authoritarian attitudes.

measured_by: SDO6 Scale by Pratto et al. (1994)
justification: The SDO6 scale is composed of sixteen items measured on a 7-point Likert scale, demonstrating excellent internal reliability, providing a comprehensive measure of SDO among participants.

measured_by: Global Belief in a Just World Scale (GBJWS) by Lipkus (1991)
justification: The GBJWS includes seven items rated on a 7-point Likert scale. It is a well-established measure serving as a potent tool for evaluating the general belief in a just world among respondents.
